name: generate_area_chart
description: Generate a area chart to show data trends under continuous independent variables and observe the overall data trend, such as, displacement = velocity (average or instantaneous) × time: s = v × t. If the x-axis is time (t) and the y-axis is velocity (v) at each moment, an area chart allows you to observe the trend of velocity over time and infer the distance traveled by the area's size.

data.description: Data for area chart, such as, [{ time: '2018', value: 99.9 }].

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, area charts require a 'group' field in the data.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.
